Question: Also at the University he met Anatoly Sobchak who later played an important role in this person's career.
Hints: On his appointment, few expected this person, virtually unknown to the general public, to last any longer than his predecessors.
In his May 2006 annual speech, this person announced increasing maternity benefits and state support of prenatal care for women.
On assuming this role, this person went on a previously scheduled visit to Russian troops in Chechnya.
